backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining task, user, payout, and admin data models with admin-restricted dashboard and payout management functions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summaries of all frontend components and pages for documentation and reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon metadata.
frontend/README.md: Frontend project overview describing features, tech stack, and development setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes for public, authenticated, and admin sections of the app.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard that checks admin status and redirects unauthorized users to the access-denied page.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: App layout wrapper providing header, footer navigation, and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate handling login flow, profile loading, and onboarding redirection.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with four main app routes and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass-style card wrapper with blur, border, and shadow styling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Sign-in/sign-out button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
Displays the user's principal ID with show/hide and copy-to-clipboard controls.
frontend/src/components/TaskSubmissionFo: Form for submitting task completion proof with text, optional URL, and placeholder submit logic.
frontend/src/components/TextLogo.tsx: Simple component rendering the 'XTask' text logo.
frontend/src/components/TopHeader.tsx: Fixed top navigation header with logo, notifications, and support buttons.
frontend/src/deployInfo.ts: Build-time utility that validates deployment environment variables and generates deployment metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminDashb: Query hook fetching admin dashboard statistics from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPayou: Provides queries and mutations for retrieving and updating payout requests.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminStatu: Query hook checking whether the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerProf: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTasks.ts: Hooks to fetch tasks periodically and create new tasks through the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base layer and theme variables plus global styles and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up query client, and wraps the app with identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Displays platform and deployment information with configuration error warnings if required environment variables are missing.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Shows an access denied message and provides a button to navigate back to the dashboard.
Shows admin statistics with loading and error states, including totals for users, earnings, active tasks, and payouts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin panel layout with navigation, sidebar, and wrapper for admin subpages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPayouts.ts: Displays payout requests with status badges and lets admins approve or decline them, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupport.ts: Placeholder support page showing no tickets yet.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTasks.tsx: Allows admins to create tasks and view existing ones, including form handling and validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminUsers.tsx: Placeholder user management page indicating upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Fetches and displays the user's profile with earnings, task stats, and a referral code copy feature.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Public landing page that promotes the platform and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Shows a placeholder notifications panel indicating no current notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Handles new user profile creation with name and optional referral code submission.
frontend/src/pages/Payout.tsx: Displays payout balance, minimum withdrawal info, and placeholder payout and transaction sections.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shows user profile details, referral info, principal reveal, and account settings links.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Provides a placeholder support page indicating upcoming support system features.
frontend/src/pages/SupportThread.tsx: Placeholder page for viewing individual support threads.
frontend/src/pages/TaskDetails.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single task, handling loading, not found states, and submission or completion status UI.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Lists all tasks with status, reward, and a button to view details, showing skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, including deployment notes, known issues, and pending adminâ€‘related feature requests.
